metadata.title: CVE-2017-12166 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: OpenVPN versions before 2.3.3 and 2.4.x before 2.4.4 are vulnerable to a buffer overflow vulnerability when key-method 1 is used, possibly resulting in code execution. sbeattie> vulnerable only in configurations that have 'key method 1â€™ set.

criterions.comment: openvpn package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.7-1ubuntu2').
